data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 140,000 people living in Northland, New Zealand. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Northland, New Zealand
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Northland to exponentially multiply disciples.
Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Northland, New Zealand.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Northland, New Zealand.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Jew, English-speaking people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 24,742 believers in Northland, New Zealand a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 24,742 believers in Northland to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 115,258 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.section_summary:
the state of Northland, New Zealand has a population of 140,000.

We estimate Northland has 24,742 people who might know Jesus, 46,723 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 68,535 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Northland, New Zealand find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.
